Cell.Data: The DEV TEAM / MISC NOTES column contains info on what text between { } signs means (if applicable). It usually stands for either a numeric value, or a numeric value with an icon. Text between [ ] signs stands for a certain type of icon.
Name of a unique world map sector.
Name of a unique world map sector.
Name of a unique world map sector.
Name of a unique world map sector.
Name of a unique world map sector.
Name of a unique world map sector.
Name of a unique world map sector.
Name of a unique world map sector.
Name of a unique world map sector.
Name of a unique world map sector.
Name of a unique world map sector.
Name of a unique world map sector.
Name of a unique world map sector.
Name of a unique world map sector.
Views the Zhelezo claim on Chimera Glacialis as illegal and illegitimate.
认为泽勒佐占领奇美拉冰川的行为是非法的。
Mephilas is intent on stopping Korvin from uncovering the source.
梅菲拉斯意图阻止科尔温找到源头。
Mephilas seems to leave the Rassvet alone.
梅菲拉斯似乎不会干涉拉斯维特。
The Rassvet seem to begrudgingly leave the Redeemers be.
拉斯维特似乎很不情愿放任救赎者不管。
Mephilas seems to dislike the Syndicate of House Antares.
梅菲拉斯似乎不喜欢辛迪加的安塔利斯家族。
House Antares stands against the darkness.
安塔利斯家族反对黑暗。
Your gift has appeased the Rassvet.
你的礼物使拉斯维特平静了下来。
You fought alongside them and brought Mordechai back alive.
你与他们并肩作战并将莫迪凯活捉了回来。
You fought alongside them and brought Mordechai back alive.
你与他们并肩作战并将莫迪凯活捉了回来。
Order this Colony to produce 'Arena Modules' to contribute to the construction of the Dvar Settlement Arena.
命令该殖民地生产“竞技场模块”从而建造矮人和解竞技场。
Unused text. Tag is needed for game functionality. Please ignore.
A Dvar Settlement arena, customarily built by the challenger according to ancient Dvarian custom.
矮人和解竞技场，根据矮人风俗，通常由挑战者建造。
"Settlement" is a term used for a tradition used by the Dvar to settle disputes.
The unearthed entrance to an underground vault.
发掘出来的通往地下宝库的入口。
Victory Condition: Inessa Zhelezo Must Survive
胜利条件：伊涅萨·泽勒佐必须存活
伊涅萨·泽勒佐必须存活
Inessa Zhelezo must survive the conflict on Chimera Glacialis.
伊涅萨·泽勒佐必须在奇美拉冰川的冲突中存活。
胜利条件：占领奇美拉冰川

The Zhelezo Dvar found Chimera Glacialis. They should be the ones to exploit its riches. Secure your claim on this world's resources to win the mission and handle the competition through dominance or appeasement.
泽勒佐矮人最早发现了奇美拉冰川星球。他们理应享有开发其财富的权利。获得这个星球的资源主权来完成任务，通过统治或绥靖方式来应对竞争。
Victory Condition: Locate the lost Cosmite shipments
胜利条件：找到遗失的宇宙合金货物
Find and claim the lost Cosmite shipments
寻找并获得遗失的宇宙合金货物
An immense bounty of Cosmite was mined on this world, yet may never have left, recovering those shipments could redeem the expedition.
这个星球曾经开采出了大量的宇宙合金资源，但却不知去向。回收这些货物可以弥补这次探险的开销。
解决泽勒佐和拉斯维特的冲突

{STR_LeaderName_KORVIN_ZHELEZO} has disobeyed the Adamant council, Consortium Rassvet has no doubt been informed and will be looking to enforce their claim, a great gift could ease the tentions however and perhaps avoid war.
{STR_LeaderName_KORVIN_ZHELEZO}违背了坚毅委员会的意志，拉斯维特财团无疑已经获悉了这一点并且将强行宣示他们的主权。不过，送上一份丰厚的大礼也许就能够缓解这种紧张的关系，甚至还能避免战争。

Our newly assembled prospector can be put to good use prospecting the surrounding sectors, collect additional resources through prospecting using the Prospector. [br/][br/][recommendedcol](Hint: Move a Prospector onto the center of a sector to use the 'Prospect Sector' strategic operation.)[/recommendedcol]
我们新组装的勘探者将在勘探周围区域时排上大用场。使用勘探者在勘探过程中收集更多资源。[br/][br/][recommendedcol]（提示：将勘探者移到一个区域的中心并使用“勘探区域”战略行动。）[/recommendedcol]
Director {STR_LeaderName_KORVIN_ZHELEZO}, forgive my intrusion, but we have assembled a Prospector with our remaining spare parts.
{STR_LeaderName_KORVIN_ZHELEZO}领袖，请原谅我的冒昧。我们用剩余的零件新组装了一台勘探者。
Directress {STR_LeaderName_KORVIN_ZHELEZO}, forgive my intrusion but we have assembled a prospector with our remaining spare parts.
{STR_LeaderName_KORVIN_ZHELEZO}领袖，请原谅我的冒昧。我们用剩余的零件新组装了一台勘探者。
Speaker: Dvar Foreman "Prospector" refers to an in-game unit.
Excellent! Put him to work prospecting the surrounding sectors immediately.
太好了！立即将其投入使用，开始勘探周围区域。
One of the sectors you have uncovered presents an excellent opportunity for expansion, construct a Colonizer and settle a second colony.
你所发现的其中一个区域非常有利于扩张，建造殖民者并建立第二个殖民地。
Quest description. "Colonizer" refers to an in-game unit.
"Colony" refers to the colonies that the player builds in game.
Director {STR_LeaderName_KORVIN_ZHELEZO}, this sector looks like an excellent area to settle an additional colony on. Build a colonizer and use it to claim this sector for the Zhelezo Consortium.
{STR_LeaderName_KORVIN_ZHELEZO}领袖，这片区域看上去十分适合建立额外的殖民地。建造殖民者并为泽勒佐财团占领该区域。
Speaker: Dvar Foreman "Prospector" refers to an in-game unit.

I see our unwelcome guests have arrived, just as she said you would. I am Mephilas the Redeemer, and I will lead my kin to salvation from these prisons of iron and flesh. Rejoice, for your fall will herald our salvation!
正如她所说，我们的不速之客已经来了。我是救赎者梅菲拉斯，我要带领我的族人从这铁与肉的牢狱中走向救赎。你应当感到欣慰，因为你们的灭亡将预示我们的救赎！
Appease the Rassvet with a gift
Appease the Rassvet with a gift of Cosmite
用宇宙合金当作礼物来安抚拉斯维特

Consortium Zhelezo has disobeyed the Adamant Council and is now mining this world illegally, the Rassvet will no doubt attempt to enforce their claim. Sending a large gift of Cosmite will make them more inclined to resolve this conflict peacefully.[br/][br/][recommendedcol](Hint: Once you have sufficient resources to complete the quest, reopen the quest from within the "Objectives" panel. There you can pay the resources.)[/recommendedcol]
泽勒佐财团违抗了坚毅委员会，正在这个世界进行非法开采，拉斯维特无疑会强行宣示他们的主权。送一份宇宙合金大礼将使他们更倾向于和平解决这场冲突。[br/][br/][recommendedcol]（提示：拥有完成任务所需的资源后，在“目标”面板中重新打开任务，你可以在那里支付资源。）[/recommendedcol]
"Adamant Council" refers to the elite ruling autority of the Dvar race.

{STR_LeaderFirstName}, I should have known you would not be able to let this lie. The Adamant Council pledged this world to us. You are a fool if you believe that the council will stand by and let you disobey them.
{STR_LeaderFirstName}，我本该知道你肯定会出手干预。坚毅委员会承诺这个世界属于我们，如果你觉得委员会会坐视不管，任由你违背他们的意志，那你可真是个傻子。

The Zhelezo Dvar found this world, Rassvet. The Adamant Council disregards decades of tradition to deny us our rightful claim. We need not fight - you were once family. I will give you a choice: withdraw now, or we will take our due by force.
矮人泽勒佐建立了这个世界，拉斯维特。坚毅委员会无视我们数十年来的传统，否定我们的正当权利。你曾经也是家庭的一员，我们没必要开战。做个选择吧：要么立即撤离，要么我们就要动用武力拿走属于我们的东西。
I will enforce the law of the council, my consortium relies on me, {STR_LeaderFirstName}, and I cannot show weakness. Alexandra would never have wanted this.
我将执行委员会的法律，我的财团都指望着我，{STR_LeaderFirstName}。我不能展现出一丝软弱，亚历山德拉绝不会想要这样的。
Alexandra\Alexander's gender changes depending on the gender of the player. (Male/female or Female/Male)

Father, there is plenty on this world for both our consortia. Cooperation is far less expensive than war. I know Uncle will avoid hostilities in favor of profit, so we should be able to avoid bloodshed by plying him with the right gifts.
父亲，这个世界对我们两个财团来说都是一座宝库，合作的代价远远低于战争。我知道叔叔为了利益着想定会避免挑起战争，所以只要献上合适的礼物应该就能避免流血牺牲。
Speaker: Inessa Zhelezo, daughter of Korvin. (Dvar, always female) Text changes depending on player character's gender.

Valodny Rassvet, in order to show our intent for a peaceful coexistence, we offer you a gift: a share of our profits. We must set aside our past differences if we are to be able to take advantage of this world’s riches.
瓦洛迪尼·拉斯维特，为了表明我们愿意和谐共处的心愿，我们为你献上一份礼物：与你分享我们所得的一部分利益。我们必须将过去的分歧抛诸脑后，才能共同利用这个世界上丰富的资源。
Valodny Rassvet is the rival of Khorvin Zhelezo

We accept this gift as a step towards peace, {STR_LeaderName_KORVIN_ZHELEZO}. I have ordered my forces to stand down and cease all hostilities against Zhelezo assets, so I suggest you do the same. Over time, and with the right incentives, you might just earn my trust.
为了向和平迈进，我们接受这份礼物，{STR_LeaderName_KORVIN_ZHELEZO}。我已经命令部队暂停行动并停止了所有针对泽勒佐资产发动的敌对行动，我建议你也采取同样的措施。随着时间的推移，也许一个恰当的契机能够让你赢得我的信任。
I see now that I misjudged you. I have by no means forgotten your transgressions, but my resources are best spent elsewhere. In the name of my late sister, let us bury this pickaxe.
我现在才知道我错看你了，虽然我无论如何都无法原谅你所犯下的罪行，但我的资源最好还是用在其他地方。以我已故姐姐的名义，让我们埋葬这把镐锄，共同走向和平。
Alexandra\Alexander's gender changes depending on the gender of the player. (Male/female or Female/Male)
Alexandra was right about you. You’ve proven yourself willing to reconcile and make amends. Our forces will come to your aid should you need them.
亚历山德拉没有看错你。你已经证明了自己想要达成和解改过自新的意愿，我们的部队将会在你需要的时候倾力相助。
Alexandra\Alexander's gender changes depending on the gender of the player. (Male/female or Female/Male)
Then we share our steel again, just as we once did. We stand stronger together.
到时我们就会像过去那样再次同舟共济，在团结中变得更强大。

{STR_LeaderName_KORVIN_ZHELEZO}, at long last the rift between our Consortia is mended. The Rassvet will stand at your side once more. In memory of Alexandra, we will work together to better the future of all Dvar.
{STR_LeaderName_KORVIN_ZHELEZO}，我们两个财团之间的裂隙终于得到了修复。拉斯维特将再次与你站在同一阵线。为了纪念亚历山德拉，我们将齐心协力，为了矮人族美好的明天而奋斗。
Alexandra\Alexander's gender changes depending on the gender of the player. (Male/female or Female/Male)

It saddens me it must come to this, but I will do my duty. In the name of the Adamant Council and all Dvar, we will assert our control over this world, as is our right. We’ll see you returned to the Council in chains.
事情沦落到这一步让我感到寒心，但我会履行我的使命。我们将以坚毅委员会和所有矮人的名义控制这个世界，因为这是我们的权力。我们将见证你戴着镣铐回到委员会。

In accordance to Dvar tradition, the challenger of a 'Settlement' must construct the 'Settlement Arena', the task in itself is a proof of worth and necessity of the duel.[br/][br/][recommendedcol](Hint: You can find any available quest production options in the "Structure Production" panel of the colony center.)[/recommendedcol]
根据矮人的传统，前来“和解”的挑战者必须建造“和解竞技场”，这项任务本身就是对决的价值和必要性的证明。[br/][br/][recommendedcol]（提示：你可以在殖民地中心的“建筑生产”面板中找到可用的任务生产选项。）[/recommendedcol]
"Settlement" refers to a Dvar tradition to settle disagreements.
Valodny, we still have a grudge to resolve. I challenge you to a Settlement.
瓦洛迪尼，我们之间还有恩怨需要了结。我向你发出“和解”挑战。

Though I’m disappointed to hear this, I can’t say I didn’t expect it. Dvar custom demands that I accept your challenge. Prove your worth, fulfil your burden as challenger. Build the Settlement Arena, and my champion will come to face you.
听到这个消息我有点失望，但也不能说我完全没有想到。根据矮人族的风俗，我必须接受你的挑战。证明你的价值，履行你作为挑战者的职责，建造和解竞技场。然后我的勇士将迎接你的挑战。
"Settlement Arena" refers to a Dvar arena used to perform Settlements.
Hmpf, using a champion is your right, and nothing more than I expected of you. Send your best - I intend to settle this decisively.
哼，派遣勇士是你的权利，不过我也没指望你还能有什么本事。把你最厉害的勇士派出来，我想要干脆果断一点。
Father, this project will require a significant investment of our resources. If we truly wish to go through with this, we will need to turn our colonies' production towards this project.
父亲，该项目需要我们投入大量资源。如果我们真的要这么做，我们需要将殖民地里的生产投入到该项目中。
Depends on if the player character is male or female.
The Arena is built, it is time to face the Rassvet Champion and settle this grudge.
竞技场已建造完毕。是时候面对拉斯维特勇士，解决这场宿怨了。
"Arena" refers to a Dvar arena used to perform Settlements.
Defeat the Rassvet champion and emerge from the Settlement Victorious
打败拉斯维特勇士，在和解胜利中脱颖而出
The arena stands, Valodny, and the time has come for our Settlement. Send forth your champion, or face me yourself if you dare. Today you will pay for your part in Alexandra's fate!
竞技场已建造完毕，瓦洛迪尼，是时候了结我们之间的恩怨了。派出你的勇士，如果你有胆量，也可以亲自与我较量。今天，你将为亚历山德拉的命运付出代价！
Alexandra\Alexander's gender changes depending on the gender of the player. (Male/female or Female/Male)
I had no part in what happened to Alexandra! Someone had a hand in her death, but it was not one of us. You forget you are not the only one she was stolen from.
亚历山德拉的死跟我没有关系！有人在中间动了手脚，但不是我们。你不要忘了，失去她的人可不止你一个。
Alexandra\Alexander's gender changes depending on the gender of the player. (Male/female or Female/Male)

Her death was no coincidence! She was murdered by cowards who feared her words, while you stood by and did nothing! I never stopped looking for the ones responsible, but you were so quick to abandon her memory. Your consortium were fools, unfit to protect her! You might as well have killed her yourself.
她的死绝非巧合！她惨遭那些畏惧她言语之人所害，而你却站在一旁无动于衷！我从未停止寻找犯下此行之人，而你竟然这么快就把她遗忘了。你的财团都是一群蠢货，根本不配保护她！说不定就是你亲手杀害了她。
Alexandra\Alexander's gender changes depending on the gender of the player. (Male/female or Female/Male)

It is you who is the fool! You fight phantoms and make enemies where there are none! We are not your enemy, {STR_LeaderFirstName}. You are too stubborn to see reason, so let’s settle this your way: in the arena.
你才是蠢货！你在和幻觉斗争，与根本不存在的人为敌！我们不是你的敌人，{STR_LeaderFirstName}。你太固执了，固执到失去了理智。既然这样，那我们就按照你的方式来解决吧。竞技场中见。
Enough! We concede defeat. What are your demands?
够了！我们投降。你想要什么？
I demand an explanation, the whole truth. Why did you give up on her?
我需要一个解释，事情的全部真相。你为什么要放弃她？

I’ll tell you what I know. Alexandra was killed while visiting us. The escaping assassins eluded our best security. It all happened too quickly. We confirmed her lodgings were obliterated by Dvar explosives.
我会把我知道的都告诉你。亚历山德拉是在拜访我们时被杀害的。逃走的刺客躲过了我们最优秀的保安人员。一切都发生得太快了。经过确认，她的房间是被矮人爆炸物给炸毁的。
Alexandra\Alexander's gender changes depending on the gender of the player. (Male/female or Female/Male)

Then the Council commandeered our investigation before we could review the incriminating chemical evidence. She was part of the Council, so I understand its interest, but I am still tormented by how quick they were to respond, how prepared they were to take control of the situation.
随后，委员会在我们对足以定罪的化学证据进行检查前强行接手了我们的调查。她是委员会的成员，所以我了解其中的利害关系，但他们的反应为何如此之快？他们接管调查时的准备为何如此充分？这些问题一直困扰着我。
Alexandra\Alexander's gender changes depending on the gender of the player. (Male/female or Female/Male)

I knew the Council took over the investigation and Dvar weapons were used, but the assassination’s swiftness and the Council’s cover up points to conspiracy. The Assembly on this world have been hunting us since we touched down, spouting something about how they were warned of our arrival, yet you remained unscathed.
我知道委员会接管了调查，我也知道刺客使用的是矮人武器，但是这场刺杀的速度和委员会的遮掩都表明了这是一场阴谋。自从我们着陆以来，这个世界中的半机械人就一直在追杀我们，他们滔滔不绝地警告着我们的到来，而你们却什么事也没有。
"Assembly" refers to an in-game cyborg race.
Yes, the Council warned us of the Assembly. They told us not to interfere. Perhaps the Adamant Council and these 'Redeemers' are in league together?
没错，委员会向我们警告过半机械人的事情。他们告诉我们不要干预。也许坚毅委员会和这些所谓的救赎者结成了联盟？
"Redeemers" refers to the cult that the Assembly are part of.

I’m certain they are. Standard operating procedure dictates the elimination of competitors. The Council’s neglect of these 'Redeemers' proves to me that they had something to gain by their continued survival.
一定是这样。标准操作流程命令要消灭竞争者。既然委员会无视这些救赎者，那就证明他们能够从救赎者的持续生存中获得某利益。
Your seed of distrust has infected poor Valodny. My Mistress underestimates Dvar loyalty. No matter! We will excise this infection and use your heads to construct an Inspector.
你怀疑的种子已经感染了可怜的瓦洛迪尼。我的女主人低估了矮人的忠诚。无论怎样！我们将切除这种感染，用你的首级建造巡查者。
Your 'Mistress'? You’ll regret interfering with the Consortia. You will not stand in the way of the Dvar!
你的“女主人”？你会后悔干预财团事务的。你不能阻碍矮人的道路！
Bold words coming from a once-loyal puppet. The Dvar are her minions to toy with. All will be liberated from the burden of flesh. All will be reborn. Your meddling only heralds your doom.
曾经忠诚的傀儡竟然口出如此狂言。矮人只是供她玩弄的仆从罢了。一切都将从血肉的负担中解放，一切都将会重生。你现在的多管闲事只不过是你毁灭的前兆罢了。
It seems that I underestimated the danger of this world. Its riches are now yours to claim. Do the Dvar proud, for I no longer can.
看来我低估了这个世界的危险，丰富的资源现在归你所有了。让矮人一族为你骄傲，因为我已经无法做到这一点了。

I should have known that you would be my undoing in the end, {STR_LeaderName_KORVIN_ZHELEZO}... You were my blood, a part of my Consortium as much as any son or daughter of Rassvet. But when Alexandra died, you scorned our camaraderie. I see now that you would never have been able to accept us.
我早该知道我终究会栽在你的手上，{STR_LeaderName_KORVIN_ZHELEZO}…你曾经是我的血脉，是我财团的一份子，就像拉斯维特所有的子女一样。但当亚历山德拉死亡时，你却对我们的情谊表示不屑。现在我明白了，你是永远都不会接受我们的。
Alexandra\Alexander's gender changes depending on the gender of the player. (Male/female or Female/Male)
I can only hope this reckless 'vengeance' brings you peace. I’m grateful Alexandra never saw what you’ve become.
我只能希望这个鲁莽的“复仇”能够给你带来安宁。让我感激的是，亚历山德拉永远也不会看到你变成了什么样子。
Alexandra\Alexander's gender changes depending on the gender of the player. (Male/female or Female/Male)
You brought this upon yourself, Rassvet. The day you stopped searching for answers, and the day you decided to stand in my way.
这是你自找的，拉斯维特。当你停止寻找答案并挡住我的去路之时，这一切都已经决定了。
Locate the source of the energy signature
Find the mysterious source of energy.

Quartzite have overrun the nearby Imperial Mining Facility, this insult to the Dvar mining ancestors cannot be allowed. Claim it![br/][br/][recommendedcol](Hint: To be able to annex a sector to a colony, that colony must be a maximum of two sectors away and have the necessary population to support an additional sector.)[/recommendedcol]
石英岩兽侵占了附近的帝国矿采设施，我们无法忍受这种对矮人采矿祖先的侮辱。把它夺回来！[br/][br/][recommendedcol]（提示：要想将区域合并至殖民地，该殖民地必须位于最多两个区域之外，并且拥有足够的人口来支持新添加的区域。）[/recommendedcol]
"Prospectors" are the in-game Dvar units that act as scouts.
Father, the encampment is setting up as ordered. There has not yet been any sign of the Rassvet.
父亲，营地已经按命令建好了。至今还没有拉斯维特的任何迹象。
Speaker: Inessa Zhelezo, daughter of Korvin. (Dvar, always female) Text changes depending on player character's gender.

Good, we have chosen a fortunate landing site. One of the mining complexes of our ancestors lies dormant nearby; it would be a shame to see their creation decay without purpose. We must assemble a force and reclaim that facility.
很好，我们选择了一个幸运的着陆地点。我们祖先的一个矿区就坐落在附近，看到他们的造物毫无目的地走向衰败将是一种耻辱。我们必须集结一支部队夺回那个设施。
Speaker: Khorvin Zhelezo (Dvar, male or female)
With our prospectors deployed, we should see to it that they are put to work exploring and prospecting nearby sectors. It would benefit us to identify suitable settlement sites.
我们的勘探者已经部署好了，我们应确保其在附近区域从事勘探工作。确定合适的定居点将对我们有好处。
Speaker: Inessa Zhelezo (Dvar, female) "Prospectors" are in-game units that scout the map.
Investigate the Cloudbreaker Mountains, where the trail ends.
调查破云山脉，踪迹在此处消失了。

I’m recovering the logs, but the data seems incomplete… The Cosmite was not shipped off world, but all of the files report ‘Repurposed by CORE’. Here’s something else interesting, an immense supply of construction materials had been sent to ‘Cloudbreaker Mountains’ in the months before the shipments went missing.
我正在恢复日志，但数据似乎并不完整…宇宙合金没有被运出星球，但所有的文件都报告称“被核心改变了用途”。还有一件趣事是，就在货物丢失的几个月前，大量建筑材料补给都被运往了“破云山脉”。
Speaker: Inessa Zhelezo (Dvar, female) "CORE" refers to the AI that ruled the Star Union alongside the Emperor/Empress. "Cloudbreaker Mountains" is the name of a sector present on the map.
CORE? Old records speak of such an entity, but it fell with the Cataclysm. The drones that guarded this place must have acted on orders over 200 years old; they are only machines after all.
核心？古老的记录中提到过这样一个实体，但它已经因大灾变而衰落了。守卫这个地方的无人机一定是按照200多年前的命令行事的；毕竟它们只是机器而已。

Speaker: Khorvin Zhelezo (Dvar, male or female) "CORE" refers to the AI that ruled the Star Union alongside the Emperor/Empress. "Cataclysm" refers to the event that destroyed the Star Union. "Irons in the fire" is an english saying, that implies CORE had plans set out for this world.
That is not even all, father, look. These seem like blueprints for a structure, though damaged as they are, I can only make out its name: “CSF Vault-05” a vault! The shipments must have gone there!
还不止这些，父亲，你看。这些看起来像是某个建筑物的设计图，虽然已经损坏，但我还能辨认出它的名字：“CSF 宝库 -05”，是一个宝库！货物一定是运到那里去了！
Speaker: Inessa Zhelezo (Dvar, female) Text changes depending on player character's gender.

Closer inspection revealed that the source is buried deep beneath the earth, acquire an Earth Crusher in order to crack the sector and reach the treasure below. The Rassvet must have brought one along for their excavation efforts…[br/][br/][recommendedcol](Hint: Move an Earth Crusher onto the center hex of a sector to use the 'Earth Crack' strategic operation.)[/recommendedcol]
进一步的检查显示源头深埋于地底，需使用裂地者进行挖掘才能找到埋在地下的宝藏。拉斯维特肯定带上了这样一台机器用于挖掘作业…[br/][br/][recommendedcol]（提示：将裂地者移动到区域的中心单元格上，使用“开山破土”战略行动。）[/recommendedcol]
Seismic scans indicate there is indeed a structure deep underneath the ground. That must be the vault!
地震扫描表明地下深处确实存在着某个建筑。那一定就是宝库了！
Speaker: Inessa Zhelezo, daughter of Korvin. (Dvar, always female)
Hmm… there seems to be no way in, it is completely isolated. Our current tools cannot excavate this deep. We need to get our hands on an Earth Crusher to break open a path down into this vault.
嗯…似乎没有进去的道路，它是完全隔离开来的。我们目前的工具挖不到这么深的地方。我们需要一台裂地者来挖出一条通往宝库的道路。
Speaker: Khorvin Zhelezo (Dvar, male or female) "Earth Crusher" refers to a Dvar unit that excavates the earth for mining purposes.
The Rassvet brought an Earth Crusher along with them as part of the contract. Maybe they’ll lend it to us if we can secure their alliance.
拉斯维特财团肯定带着裂地者而来，这是合约的一部分。如果我们能与他们结成同盟，他们也许会把它借给我们。
Speaker: Inessa Zhelezo, daughter of Korvin. (Dvar, always female) "Rassvet" refers to the Rassvet Consortium, the main rival of Zhelezo. Valodny Rassvet is the leader of the Consortium.
Your words are wise, my daughter. Forging an alliance with Rassvet may be quicker than designing and manufacturing an Earth Crusher for ourselves.
妙啊，女儿。与拉斯维特结成同盟也许比我们自己设计制造一台裂地者来得更快。
Speaker: Khorvin Zhelezo (Dvar, male or female)

{STR_LeaderName_KORVIN_ZHELEZO}, I heard you needed an Earth Crusher. In light of our reconciliation, I will lend you ‘Old Thane’, one of the finest Earth Crushers in the Rassvet Consortium’s arsenal. Bring her back in one piece.
{STR_LeaderName_KORVIN_ZHELEZO}，听说你需要一台裂地者。鉴于我们之间相处融洽，我会把拉斯维特财团军械库里最精良的裂地者“老乡绅”借给你。可别弄坏了。
Speaker: Valodny Rassvet (Dvar, always male, rival of Khorvin) "Old Thane" is the name of the Earth Crusher. A "Consortium" is a Dvar organization, usually ruled by a single family.
Excellent work, Zhelezo! We should make use of our new acquisition. Bring it to the Vault - we will crack it wide open.
干得漂亮，泽勒佐！我们应该好好利用这台设备。把它带到宝库那去，我们要砸出一个大口子来。
Speaker: Valodny Rassvet (Dvar, always male, rival of Khorvin) "the Vault" refers to the hidden vault containing a massive stockpile of Cosmite.

The Vault has been opened and the extraction operation has begun, the vile Assembly refuse to let us claim our prize in peace and are gathering a strike force nearby. Secure the vault for the Zhelezo Dvar.
宝库已经被打开，开采行动已启动。但邪恶的半机械人不会让我们安心取走宝物，他们在附近集结了一支突袭部队。为泽勒佐矮人守护宝库。
The way to the vault is clear. Follow me, and prepare for the worst. This place was clearly not meant to be uncovered and could contain additional measures for repelling intruders.
通往宝库的道路已清理完毕。跟我来，不过要做好最坏的打算。这个地方危机四伏，可能还有其他抵御入侵者的手段。
Speaker: Khorvin Zhelezo (Dvar, male or female)
Director {STR_LeaderName_KORVIN_ZHELEZO}! We’ve spotted Assembly nearby. We should be on alert in case they try to ambush us.
{STR_LeaderName_KORVIN_ZHELEZO}领袖！我们在附近发现了半机械人！我们应该保持警惕，提防他们发动伏击。
Speaker: Zhelezo Foreman (Random Dvar under Zhelezo's command) Text changes depending on player character's gender. "Assembly" refers to an in-game race. (see glossary)
The Vault's guardians lie defeated, and the Redeemer’s assault along with it. Now none can question our claim to the treasures within. Today, the Zhelezo Dvar make their name!
我们打败了宝库的守卫和救赎者的突袭，现在没人能质疑我们对宝物的所有权了。从今天起，泽勒佐矮人将名声大振！
Speaker: Khorvin Zhelezo (Dvar, male or female) "Vault's guardians" refers to the Assembly race. "Redeemer" refers to Mephilas the Redeemer, leader of said Assembly.

You trespass in the territory of House Antares. We know from prior dealings that the Dvar are too stubborn to accept peaceable trading arrangements. We warned you once before - there will not be a third warning.
你擅自闯入了安塔利斯家族的领地。我们从以往的接触得知，矮人一族十分顽固，并且不愿接受和平贸易协定。我们之前已经警告过你一次了，事不过三。
Speaker: Malai of House Antares (Syndicate, female) "you" refers to Khorvin Zhelezo and can be either male or female.
We are not Rassvet. I am {STR_LeaderName_KORVIN_ZHELEZO} of the Zhelezo Dvar Consortium. We’ve denied no such offer. Perhaps we can come to an understanding where the Rassvet would not.
我们不是拉斯维特财团的人。我是来自泽勒佐财团的{STR_LeaderName_KORVIN_ZHELEZO}。我们未曾拒绝过这样的提议，也许在拉斯维特财团不同意的方面，我们可以达成共识。
Speaker: Khorvin Zhelezo (Dvar, male or female)

You are bold, {STR_LeaderName_KORVIN_ZHELEZO}. I like that. We seek someone on this world, a man of our House named Mordechai Antares. He came here after witnessing a vision and he has no doubt gotten himself in trouble already. If you find him and convince him to return home, we will compensate you handsomely.
你很有勇气，{STR_LeaderName_KORVIN_ZHELEZO}，我喜欢这一点。我们正在这个世界中寻找一个人，他是我们家族的一员，名叫莫迪凯·安塔利斯。他看到了一个幻象然后就来到了这里。毫无疑问，他肯定已经惹上了麻烦。如果你发现了他并把他劝说回来，我们会给你一笔丰厚的酬劳。
Speaker: Malai of House Antares (Syndicate, female) "you" refers to Khorvin Zhelezo and can be either male or female. "House" is Syndicate terminology for their organization.
This Mordechai reminds me of you, father. Regardless, we must be careful when dealing with the Syndicate, they are rarely reliable.
这个名叫莫迪凯的人让我想起了你，父亲。无论如何，我们和辛迪加人打交道时必须小心谨慎，他们都不怎么可靠。
Speaker: Inessa Zhelezo Target is Khorvin Zhelezo and can be either male or female.
You are correct Inessa, but this House Antares seems to be driven by nobler motivations. Let’s find this Mordechai. We will need allies if we are to enforce our claim on this world.
你说的对，伊涅萨。但是这个安塔利斯家族似乎被某种更为崇高的动机所驱使。我们去找找这个莫迪凯吧。想要统治这个世界，没有盟友可不行。
Speaker: Khorvin Zhelezo (Dvar, male or female) "House Antares" is the Syndicate House.

Despite how you have so graciously helped me before, I cannot fight my sister. May the light of Antares grant you the wisdom to seek peace with my House. Goodbye, Director Korvin. May our houses resolve our differences peacefully.
尽管你曾经慷慨相助，但我不能与我的姐妹为敌。愿安塔利斯家族的光芒赐予你与我们家族和平共处的智慧。再见了，科尔温领袖。愿我们家族之间的分歧能够和平解决。
Speaker: Mordechai of House Antares (Syndicate, male) Target is Khorvin Zhelezo and can be either male or female.
The Syndicate representative of House Antares, Malai has promised aid in return for finding and returning a member of her house: Mordechai Antares.
辛迪加人的安塔利斯家族代表玛莱为了感谢我们找到并带回她的家族成员莫迪凯·安塔利斯，承诺为我们提供帮助。

Mordechai supposedly set off to Chimera Glacialis after a vision. There must be sites of particular strength to Psionics on this world. Perhaps Mordechai can be found there.[br/][br/][recommendedcol](Hint: This is an adventure quest. Make sure to bring an army when you move to the target location.)[/recommendedcol]
据说莫迪凯在目睹了幻象之后动身前往了奇美拉冰川。那里一定存在这个世界上具有特殊灵能力量的地点。也许我们可以在那儿找到莫迪凯。[br/][br/][recommendedcol]（提示：这是一个冒险任务。移动至目标地点时请确保带上了一支军队。）[/recommendedcol]
"Chimera-V" is the name of the planet that the mission takes place on.
We found Mordechai. He seeks to disrupt a vile psionic ritual, performed at an old cultist shrine. If we help him that will surely secure friendly relations with the Syndicate of House Antares.
我们找到了莫迪凯，他想要破坏古老的宗教圣地中正在举行的某种邪恶灵能仪式。如果我们帮助他，就一定能与辛迪加的安塔利斯家族建立友好关系。
Quest description. "Mordechai" refers to Mordechai of House Antares, the person the player is looking for. (Syndicate, male)
You must be Mordechai. Malai of House Antares bids you return to your house.
你一定就是莫迪凯了，安塔利斯家族的玛莱想要你回去。
You must be Mordechai. Before she fell, the lady of House Antares requested your return.
你一定就是莫迪凯了。安塔利斯家族的女士在去世前希望你能回去。

My sister can wait. The heretics calling themselves 'Redeemers' are enacting vile rituals nearby. I cannot allow them to desecrate this world any longer. The Abyss's grip on this place tightens with every passing minute. I have already suffered losses and prospects were looking grim, but with your forces at our side we may be able to strike them down.
我姐姐的事情可以先放到一旁。一群自称为“救赎者”的异端正在附近举行邪恶的仪式。我无法再容忍他们亵渎这个世界了。时间每过去一秒，深渊对这里的掌控就加深一分。我已经蒙受了巨大损失，前景一片灰暗，所幸有你的部队助阵，我们也许能够击败他们。
Speaker: Mordechai of House Antares (Syndicate, male) Target is Khorvin Zhelezo and can be either male or female. "Redeemers" refers to the Assembly in this mission.

If my sister has fallen, the least I can do is retaliate against these Redeemers. A contingent of the heretics is enacting vile rituals nearby. The Abyss's grip on this world tightens, and I have already suffered losses. Prospects are looking grim, but with your forces at our side, we may yet be able to avenge her.
如果我姐姐已经死了，那我就更要向这些救赎者报仇了。一群异教徒正在附近举行邪恶的仪式，深渊对这个星球的控制越来越强了，我已经失去了很多。尽管前途暗淡，但有你的部队帮忙，我们也许还能为她报仇。

The Redeemers are a threat to us as well, father. Disrupting this ritual could hinder their efforts greatly, not to mention secure friendly relations with House Antares. Mordechai and his army could prove helpful, but perhaps we should send him back to his sister. What is your decision?
救赎者对我们来说也是一个威胁，父亲。破坏这个仪式可以极其有效地阻碍他们的努力，还能与安塔利斯家族建立友好关系。莫迪凯和他的军队应该能帮到我们，但也许我们应该让他回去找他的姐姐。你作何决定？
Speaker: Inessa Zhelezo, daughter of Korvin. (Dvar, always female)

The Redeemers are a threat to us as well, father. Disrupting this ritual could hinder their efforts greatly, not to mention secure friendly relations with House Antares. Mordechai and his army could prove helpful – we should grant him the vengeance he seeks.
救赎者对我们来说也是一个威胁，父亲。破坏这个仪式可以极其有效地阻止他们的努力，还能与安塔利斯家族建立友好关系。莫迪凯和他的军队应该能帮到我们，我们应该给他一个报仇雪恨的机会。
Speaker: Inessa Zhelezo, daughter of Korvin. (Dvar, always female)
My daughter speaks true, and there is wisdom in your words as well, Lord Antares. We accept your aid.
我女儿说得没错，你也说得在理，安塔利斯领主。我们接受你的帮助。
Speaker: Khorvin Zhelezo (Dvar, male or female) "Lord Antares" refers to Mordechai of House Antares.
Excellent! Let us not delay any longer. We await your signal. By the light of Antares, we will purge these abominations.
太好了！别再耽搁了。我们等着你的信号。在安塔利斯光芒的照耀下，我们将净化这些令人憎恶的异端。
Speaker: Mordechai of House Antares (Syndicate, male) Target is Khorvin Zhelezo and can be either male or female.
I will not risk you and your already battered forces in this endeavor. Return to your sister. We’ll complete what you could not.
我不会冒险让你和你伤痕累累的部队继续战斗下去。回你姐姐身边去吧，我们将完成你未竟的事业。
Speaker: Khorvin Zhelezo (Dvar, male or female)
You cannot be serious? The Redeemers will destroy you… Nevertheless, without your assistance, we have no choice but to return home and recover. Perhaps we shall speak again… if you are successful.
你不是认真的吧？救赎者将把你们撕碎的…不过，如果没有你们的帮助，我们也别无选择只能回家休整。也许我们会再见面的…如果你这次能成功的话。
Speaker: Mordechai of House Antares (Syndicate, male) Target is Khorvin Zhelezo and can be either male or female.

The cultist lay defeated at our feet, the ritual is disrupted. Regardless Malai's killers still remain out there… I cannot return home until those that wronged my house have been brought to justice. I will join you in your struggle {STR_LeaderName_KORVIN_ZHELEZO}, guide my hand to vengeance.
邪教分子倒在了我们脚下，仪式已被破坏，但杀害玛莱的凶手仍然逍遥法外…除非冒犯我家族的人全部被绳之以法，否则我是不会回家的。我会加入你的部队，{STR_LeaderName_KORVIN_ZHELEZO}，指引我踏上复仇之路吧。
I see now that my vision was but a herald of my end… my own, and my sister's…
现在，我终于明白了。我所见到的幻象只不过是我走向终结的预兆…我自己的，还有我姐姐的…

It is good to see you’re a Dvar of your word. My brother has returned to me and he speaks highly of your valor. I too shall keep my word. We shall direct our efforts towards stopping this Redeemer cult.
很高兴看到你是一个说话算数的矮人。我弟弟已经回到了我身边，他对你的英勇给予了很高的评价。我也会遵守我的诺言。我们会调兵阻止这个救赎者异教团体的。
Speaker: Malai of House Antares (Syndicate, female) "brother" refers to Mordechai of House Antares.

This abhorrent world has killed my brother, and you let it happen. I see that your words are nothing but empty promises. We will bring his body home to rest. I shall mourn his loss… and think twice before trusting a Dvar again.
这个可憎的世界夺走了我弟弟的性命，而你竟然让这种事发生了。我看你就只会许下空洞的诺言罢了。我们会把他的遗体带回家乡安葬。我会为他哀悼…并且重新考虑是否要再次相信任何一个矮人。
Speaker: Malai of House Antares (Syndicate, female) "brother" refers to Mordechai of House Antares if he dies.

Mordechai has returned to us. Although he grumbles about the honor he has been denied, I see that he’s impressed with your feat. I shall keep my word. House Antares will aid you in your conflict against the Redeemers.
莫迪凯回到我们身边了。虽然他对自己没有被给予赢得荣誉的机会感到抱怨，但我能看出来你的英勇事迹给他留下了深刻的印象。我会遵守我的诺言。安塔利斯家族将在你与救赎者的冲突中助你一臂之力。
Speaker: Malai of House Antares (Syndicate, female)

Greetings Master Zhelezo, I have seen the valor of the Dvar firsthand and I think there is much I we could learn from one another. I offer my service to you, let me fight alongside you and together we will show these Redeemers what happens to those that involve themselves with the Void.
你好，泽勒佐大师。我亲眼见证了矮人的勇气，我认为我们之间有很多可以相互学习的地方。我愿效力于你，让我与你并肩作战，让这些救赎者瞧瞧与虚空打交道的人会是什么下场。
Speaker: Mordechai of House Antares (Syndicate, male) Target is Khorvin Zhelezo and can be either male or female. "Void" refers to the space and reality beyond the Star Union. People usually fear it.

Greetings Master Zhelezo. I have been impressed by the valor of your forces at the ritual site, you prevailed despite the odds. I believe there is much I we could learn from one another so I offer my service to you, let me fight alongside you. Together we will show these Redeemers what happens to those that involve themselves with the Void.
你好，泽勒佐大师。你的部队在仪式地的英勇表现令我印象深刻。尽管困难重重，你还是取得了胜利。我相信我们之间有很多可以相互学习的地方。我愿效力于你，让我与你并肩作战，让这些救赎者瞧瞧与虚空打交道的人会是什么下场。
Speaker: Mordechai of House Antares (Syndicate, male) Target is Khorvin Zhelezo and can be either male or female. "Void" refers to the space and reality beyond the Star Union. People usually fear it.

Scanning bio-mass… unknown organic: database updated. Greetings, Ex-Star Union citizen. We are Autonom, the cognitive fork of the Conscientious Omnipresent Regency Engine, known to you as C.O.R.E. Present identification.
正在扫描生物量…未知有机物：数据库已更新。你好，前星际联盟市民。我们是自主机械，是“勤勉全能摄政引擎”，也就是被你们称为“核心”的一个具有感知能力的分支。请出示身份证明。
Speaker: Autonom Network (Autonom, gender-less, robot) "Conscientious Omnipresent Regency Engine" refers to the AI that controlled the Star Union, abreviated as "C.O.R.E"
Greetings, machine, we are the Zhelezo Dvar. We lay claim to this world's riches.
你好，机械，我们是泽勒佐矮人。这个世界的财富归我们所有。
Speaker: Khorvin Zhelezo (Dvar, male or female)

Database update: Zhelezo Dvar. Autonom must learn through interactive queries. Current knowledge acquisitions inconclusive. We seek understanding: datadisk recovered, requires categorization. Autonom analysis ineffective. Biological analysis deviates from Autonom thought patterns. Request assistance with identification.
数据库更新：泽勒佐矮人。自主机械必须通过交互式提问进行学习。当前知识获取无结果。我们寻求理解：数据盘已恢复，需进行分类。自主机械分析无效。生物分析偏离自主机械思维模式。请求获得身份证明协助。
That disk seems familiar… we will consider your request Autonom.
那个数据盘有些似曾相识…我们会考虑你的请求，自主机械。
Speaker: Khorvin Zhelezo (Dvar, male or female)
The Autonom on this world might be useful allies, appeasing them by helping them understand the world around them could prove beneficial.
这个世界里的自主机械可能成为我们得力的盟友，满足他们的要求并帮助他们理解周围的世界，这可能会对你有益。

The Autonom are in posession of an encrypted Datadisk and have allowed our researchers access to it, we should set up an investigation if we want to get on the Autonom's good side, not to mention make use of it's contents.[br/][br/][recommendedcol](Hint: You can still interrupt the quest research for more urgent research projects and resume it later by accessing the "Special Research" at the bottom of the research overview.)[/recommendedcol]
自主机械拥有一块经过加密的数据盘，并且允许我们的研究员访问数据盘。如果我们想与自主机械搞好关系，我们应该开展一番调查，况且我们也可以利用里面的内容。[br/][br/][recommendedcol]（提示：你仍然可以中断任务研究以进行更加紧急的研究项目，你可以在稍后使用研究总览底部的“特殊研究”来恢复任务研究。）[/recommendedcol]

Father, the research team has completed analysis of the Datadisk. It is a holotheater disk, manufactured for the ancient Stadia Arcadia. This one contains holoperformances from a band named 'Null Behavior'. It was imprinted in a Stadium Arcadium not far from here. The original recording might still be there. Even if the Autonom still won't understand, they might be grateful.
父亲，研究团队已经完成了数据盘的分析。这是一种古时为星际体育场制造的全息影像式磁盘，里面有一场由“零行乐队”奉献的全息表演，刻录地点就在离这里不远处的星际体育场。原始录音可能仍然在那儿。虽然自主机械可能仍然无法理解，但他们会为此而感激我们的。
Speaker: Inessa Zhelezo, daughter of Korvin. (Dvar, always female) "Stadia Arcadia" refers to the stadiums used in the Star Union era for entertainment for the masses.
Let us hope so. Not as useful as I would’ve hoped, but maybe we can gain their trust, regardless of the disk’s contents. Let’s share what we know with the Autonom.
希望如此。虽然磁盘里装的东西并没有我想象中那样有用，但希望我们能够借此赢得自主机械的信任。把我们了解的情况都告诉他们吧。
Speaker: Khorvin Zhelezo (Dvar, male or female)
Processing… analysis inconclusive, require further data. Stated terminal: Stadium Arcadium. Recover original imprint of data. Source code might provide solution to inquiry.
正在处理…分析无结果，需要更多数据。规定终端：星际体育场。恢复原始刻录数据。源代码可能会提供问题的解决方案。

The Data Storage Chip contained a recording of an ancient Star Union band 'Null Behavior' the autonom are not satisfied with our answer so we must dig deeper, we should search for the location mentioned on the disk. Perhaps the original disk can be found there.
这个数据存储芯片内包有一段来自古老星际联盟“零行乐队”的录音。自主机械对这一答案并不满意，所以我们得再往深了挖。我们应该到磁盘上提到的地点去看看，也许可以在那里找到原始磁盘。
Quest description. "Null Behavior" refers to a famous Star Union era band.

We found the original datadisk, still intact. It holds a wealth of information: 'Null Behavior' was popular among a subculture known as 'Spacers'. They favored anarchistic tendencies which landed them on CORE's watchlist. The band disappeared without a trace a few months after allegations of cyber-terrorism ensued. CORE wanted the disks destroyed. It’s remarkable it survived this long.
我们找到了原始数据盘，所幸仍完好无损。磁盘上记载了丰富的信息：“零行乐队”在一个名为“太空掠夺者”的亚文化中十分流行。他们有着无政府主义倾向，因而进入了核心的监视列表。这支乐队后来受到了网络恐怖主义的指控，并在几个月后消失得无影无踪。核心想要摧毁这些磁盘。这么久以来它仍然完好无损真是个奇迹。
Speaker: Inessa Zhelezo, daughter of Korvin. (Dvar, always female) "Spacers" refers to the in-game faction by the same name.
Confirmed acquisition of uncorrupted data. Subject analysis inconclusive. Examining new data. Zhelezo Dvar is proven cooperative. Dispatching ambassador for field analysis.
确认已获得未损毁数据。主题分析无结果。正在检查新数据。事实证明泽勒佐矮人可以合作。正在派遣大使进行现场分析。
Use the Facilities' Intricate scanners to locate the source of the energy signature.
利用设施上的精密扫描器来定位能量信号源。
Disable this generator to remove it's interference of our scan.
关闭该生成器可消除扫描作业受到的干扰。
Investigate the Stadium Arcadium's ruins for any information on the Autonom Data Storage Chip.
调查星际体育场废墟，获取任何有关自主机械数据存储芯片的信息。
破译自主机械的古老数据盘。
Name of a unique world map sector.
Name of a unique world map sector.
我们的权利必须得到执行
解决泽勒佐和拉斯维特的冲突

The Rassvet were mandated by the Adamant Council to exploit this world, but as its finders it is the right of the Zhelezo to claim it. A grudge has stood between the Zhelezo and Rassvet Consortia for years, it will be resolved here, one way or another.
坚毅委员会授权拉斯维特开发这个星球，但发现这个星球的是泽勒佐财团，理应由他们占领这个星球。多年以来，泽勒佐和拉斯维特财团之间的怨恨颇深。无论如何，这个问题将在这里得到解决。
{INT_1}/{INT_2} 击败瓦洛迪尼·拉斯维特
{INT_1}/{INT_2} 与瓦洛迪尼·拉斯维特达成同盟
Do not mistake my defeat for your victory. You may not realize it yet, but you stand alone, Zhelezo. We will meet again, and when we do you will understand the meaning of my words.
不要把我的失败误认为你的胜利。你可能还没有意识到，泽勒佐，你们孤立无援。我们会再见面的，到时候你就会明白我的意思了。
A threat sounds very empty when every word is poison. Mephilas may have fled, but I suspect we will have the opportunity to settle this in due time. For now, he will no longer stand in our way.
如果字字恶毒，那威胁听起来就会很空洞。梅菲拉斯或许已经逃走了，但我怀疑我们能否有机会在适当的时候结束这一切。现在，他将不会再挡住我们的道路了。

A rich bounty of Cosmite was mined on this world, the Government Palace's logs should have records of where it went. But first you need to overcome any still intact security systems.[br/][br/][recommendedcol](Hint: This is an adventure quest. Make sure to bring an army when you move to the target location. Some landmarks need to be entered to fight its defenders. Move your army onto the structure to be able to enter it.)[/recommendedcol]
这个世界曾经开采出了丰富的宇宙合金，政府宫殿的日志中应该有记录这些资源去往了何处。但首先，你需要解决仍然生效的安全系统。[br/][br/][recommendedcol]（提示：这是一个冒险任务。移动至目标地点时请确保带上了一支军队。你需要进入某些地标与其防守者战斗，将军队移动至建筑即可进入。）[/recommendedcol]

The creations of our ancestors have a certain grace to them, do they not? Unburdened by the strife of the Cataclysm, the riches they attained were almost beyond measure. We will honor their creation by putting this place to good use.
我们祖先的造物具有某种恩赐，不是吗？他们摆脱了大灾变的困扰，获得了无法估量的财富。我们将好好利用这个地方，不让他们的创造白费。
Speaker: Khorvin Zhelezo (Dvar, male or female) "Their Creation" refers to the Quarry which the Dvar consider to

Father, I have looked through the facilities logs, and it seems that they were tampered with. Someone tried to obscure it, but an immense quantity of Cosmite was mined on this world. It may never have been shipped off world!
父亲，我检查过这些设备日志了，它们似乎被篡改了。有人试图掩盖它们，这个星球中曾经开采出了大量的宇宙合金。这些资源可能从来就没有运出这个星球！

Mother, I have looked through the facilities logs, and it seems that they were tampered with. Someone tried to obscure it, but an immense quantity of Cosmite was mined on this world. It may never have been shipped off world!
Speaker: Inessa Zhelezo (Dvar, female) "Cosmite" refers to an in-game resource that is extremely rare and precious.
Interesting… if this is true, recovering that shipment could well redeem this expedition, and get us back in the good graces of the council.
有趣…如果这是真的，回收这批货物将很好地补偿这次探险的开销，并使我们重新得到委员会的青睐。
Speaker: Khorvin Zhelezo (Dvar, male or female) "Council" refers to the "Adamant Council" the ruling body of the Dvar.

This planet’s Government Palace should hold a more detailed record of where the shipments went. We should make our way there and search their logs; if we can recover that shipment, a confrontation with Uncle may not be necessary after all!
这个星球的政府宫殿应该有一份更详细的货运记录。我们应该去那里搜索他们的日志；如果我们能找回那批货物，也许根本就没有必要和叔叔对抗了！
Speaker: Inessa Zhelezo (Dvar, female) "Uncle" refers to Valodny Rassvet, who is another player present on the map.
Hmm… there seems to be no way in, it is completely isolated. We should employ our newly acquired Earth Crusher to break open a path down into this vault.
嗯…似乎没有进去的道路，它是完全隔离开来的。我们应该使用新获得的裂地者来挖开一条通往宝库的道路。
击杀 {INT_0}/{INT_1} 个半机械人单位
The Assembly cult is interfering with your mining operations. Those abominations must be burned with fire.
半机械人信徒正在干扰你的矿采作业。那些可憎之物必须被烧死。
You speak of redemption, yet you forge abominations of flesh and steel just like yourself! Why condemn others to an existence you seek to escape?
你们嘴上说着救赎，实际上竟用血肉和钢铁铸造出像你们一样的怪物！己所不欲勿施于人，不知道吗？

The second generation is nothing like us, Dvar. They are tools. No true life was ever breathed into them, no soul. I do what I must for the redemption of my kind, a plight I’m sure you can sympathize with.
次代半机械人与我们完全不同，矮人。他们是工具，没有真正的生命注入他们，他们没有灵魂。我只是做了必须要做的事来为我的同类寻求救赎，我相信你能够理解我的苦境。

We are nothing like your kind! Our ancestors carved out new homes from the barren rocks of the harsh frontier. Pride and reverence are the least they deserve.[br/][br/]You and your abominations on the other hand have not earned your place in this universe. We will purge you with fire and melt your metal constructions into pick axes and mining carts.
我们与你们这类人完全不同！我们的祖先在贫瘠边境的岩石上开辟了新的家园，至少他们应该得到尊敬。[br/][br/]而你和你的那些怪物并没有在这个宇宙中赢得你的位置。我们将用烈焰熔化你们的金属构造，然后做成矿稿和采矿车。

Chimera Glacialis is ours, none can question that now. Not even the Adamant Council will be able to overlook such an achievement. Every bit of ore we mine on this world will bring the Zhelezo closer to their rightful place among the Adamant.
奇美拉冰川星球属于我们，现在没人能质疑这一点了。即使是坚毅委员会也不能忽视这样一个伟大的成就。我们在这个世界上开采的每一个矿石都将使泽勒佐财团更接近在坚毅委员中应有的位置。

Father, I took the liberty of sending out prospectors to investigate the Cosmite vault. It seems the Redeemers got to it first; its contents are almost entirely destroyed. Perhaps this vault was their target all along?
父亲，我擅自派出了勘探者去调查宇宙合金宝库。似乎救赎者率先找到了那里，宝库几乎已经被全部摧毁了。也许这个宝库一直以来就是他们的目标？

Mother, I took the liberty of sending out prospectors to investigate the Cosmite vault. It seems the Redeemers got to it first; its contents are almost entirely destroyed. Perhaps this vault was their target all along?

Father, our Prospectors have uncovered the remains a vault deep below the planet’s surface. However, it seems that the Redeemers got to it first: the structure is entirely destroyed and all its contents lost. Traces of Cosmite still litter the ruins; it would seem the entire worlds Cosmite shipments had been kept here. Perhaps this vault was the Redeemer’s target all along?
父亲，我们的勘探者发现了一个埋藏在这个星球地底的宝库。然而，似乎救赎者已经去过了那里：宝库已经完全被摧毁了，所有东西都没了。废墟上仍然有宇宙合金的痕迹；似乎整个星球的宇宙合金曾经保存在这里。也许这个宝库一直以来就是救赎者的目标？

Mother, our Prospectors have uncovered the remains a vault deep below the planet’s surface. However, it seems that the Redeemers got to it first: the structure is entirely destroyed and all its contents lost. Traces of Cosmite still litter the ruins; it would seem the entire worlds Cosmite shipments had been kept here. Perhaps this vault was the Redeemer’s target all along?

Hmmm, they sought redemption. The destruction of the vault must have been part of the price they were asked to pay, but to whom? Regardless it is out of our hands now, we should focus on our mining operations and await the Council’s judgement.
嗯…他们寻求救赎。摧毁宝库肯定是他们要付出的代价之一，但到底是谁要求他们这样做的呢？尽管我们现在已经无法控制，但我们应该集中精力于我们的矿采活动并等待委员会的判决。

Mission Introduction - Part 1: When the Cataclysm erupted, bringing the Star Union to its violent end, our kind was stranded on the most inhospitable worlds. Our ancestors made do with what they had: mining equipment and perseverance. They suffered for generations in the harshest conditions. Many died, but the strong survived. Now, under the watchful eye of the Adamant Council, the Dvar Consortia thrive.
Spoken by Korvin Zhelezo; added for context

Mission Introduction - Part 2: I am Korvin Zhelezo , head of the Zhelezo Dvar Consortium . Before my rule, our house was weak. We were complacent with our position. I sparked ambition in my people. The Zhelezo Dvar rose rapidly in station, but the Adamant Council still ignored us. Today everything changes. Our prospectors have found the resource-rich world of Chimera-V. Once the Council grants us mining rights, the Zhelezo Consortium will finally attain the status it deserves.
Spoken by Korvin Zhelezo; added for context

Mission Introduction - Part 3: The Council is demented! Those bumbling fools granted our proposal to the disreputable Rassvet Consortium. We found this world. By traditional claimant rights, it should be ours. It’s clear to me that the Council will never trust us, so we must carve our own path. They will not stand in the way of the Zhelezo, and neither will Valodny Rassvet!
Spoken by Korvin Zhelezo; added for context

Mission Introduction - Part 4: The world of Chimera-V lies below us, its stormy exterior hiding riches just ripe for plunder. As we descend, these storms will interfere with our ship's systems. I doubt it will be the last obstacle hiding this planet's secrets.
Spoken by Korvin Zhelezo; added for context

Mission Outro: Although we have lost the Vault and its Cosmite riches, the excavation of Chimera-V has proven as profitable for the Zhelezo as we had projected. Mining operations are running at peak efficiency. The Rassvet consortium is no longer a problem, and we have proven our rightful claim to this world.
Spoken by Korvin Zhelezo; added for context
